Regulation Name(s): Multipurpose system for in vitro coagulation studies
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for ROTEM delta Thromboelastometry System and associated assays and controls for qualitative and quantitative evaluation of whole blood coagulation status.
Indications for Use Summary: Non-invasive diagnostic instrument and assays to monitor and analyze coagulation state of citrated whole blood to assist assessment of clinical hemostasis in adult patients, commonly used for organ transplantation, cardiovascular surgery, cardiology procedures, and trauma to assess post-operative hemorrhage and/or thrombosis.
